content: ***you can find this pattern for free on my blog or you can purchase an ad-free printable pdf version including a text only version you can get find this pattern paired with just the beanie version in the 3 ml beanie + slouchy ebook or with all of the 3 ml beanie versions in the 3 ml beanie bundle ebook or with all of the 3 ml beanie versions and the matching cowl in the 3 ml bundle ebook *** this pattern is an slouchy version of my 3 ml beanie there is also a tighter beanie-style version which you can find here http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/32-ml-beanie and a messy bun version which you can find here http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/3-ml-messy-bun-beanie the pattern is designed to fit a small woman s head but can be easily adapted for larger sizes suggestions are given in the pattern itself the pattern calls for worsted weight 4 yarn i used less than a skein of i love this yarn and a size i 5 5mm and j 6 0mm crochet hook you will also need a tapestry needle and i would recommend using stitch markers but they aren t required pictures are included to help with the construction of the hat if you find yourself with any questions as you work through the pattern or just want some extra tips take a look at the faq for this pattern you can find it here http //thecookiesnob weebly com/home/faq-3-ml-slouchy-beanie 1 ***you may not copy this pattern repost it anywhere either altered or in its original form or claim it as your own you may not use any photos on this site for your own use *** 1 http //thecookiesnob weebly com/home/faq-3-ml-slouchy-beanie
